{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Hectebus flamethrower projectile | class = HectShot | game = Skulltag }}[[Classes]]: {{Class|FatShot}}→<u>BFG10kShot</u>
The large fireballs abundantly thrown by a {{Class|Hectebus}}'s flamethrowers. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HectShot</u> : {{Class|FatShot}} { {{Property|Speed}} 22 {{Property|Damage}} 12 States { Spawn: HECF AB 4 Bright Loop Death: HECF C 8 Bright HECF D 6 Bright HECF E 4 Bright Stop } }
